item.title: GitHub Actions 自动部署 Hugo：防翻车配置与排障清单
item.description: 本地 hugo 能跑，到了 GitHub Actions 就翻车，是很多博客维护者的日常。 最常见的问题不是“不会写 workflow”，而是环境不一致、版本漂移、权限设置遗漏。

item.title: Hugo Auto Deploy with GitHub Actions: Safe Config and Troubleshooting
item.description: Your local hugo build works, but GitHub Actions fails randomly. Classic. The root cause is usually not the workflow syntax. It is environment drift, missing permissions, and unstable dependencies.
